item.title: Tariffs Trap Libraries’ Internationally Loaned Books
item.description: How tariffs are impacting interlibrary loans and research, a teen organizes a rally to combat book bans in her state, and more.

item.title: The 2025 National Book Awards Shortlists Are Here
item.description: Here are the finalists in each category for the 2025 National Book Awards.

item.title: Bookshop.org Offers Free Shipping and 20% Off Banned Books for “Anti-Prime Day”
item.description: Support independent bookstores and get free shipping by purchasing books through Bookshop.org during their "Anti-Prime Day" sale.

item.title: 19 of the Most-Anticipated New Queer Books Out in October 2025
item.description: Here are 19 of the most exciting new queer books out in October 2025, from bisexual romance to sapphic gothics to an intersex memoir and more.

item.title: See What The Biggest Book Clubs Picked for October 2025!
item.description: From Read with Jenna to Stephen Colbert and more, here's what the biggest and most interesting book clubs are reading in October.
